want to do that(sorry if I seem picky).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton sat back up glareing at the hole in the cave wall the shape 
of his
> fist. the strange neiandrathal writing now just said ex. The mutant 
smiled
> at the irony. Ex is what he intended to make his latest addition to 
his hit
> list. For now though he had more important tasks to attend to. He 
exited the
> cave, transformed back to his enormous dragon form and flew off 
towards the
> Neo Decepticon base.
>

little itty
